name: Vana Workforce
description: HR software for SMBs on Force.com
overview:
Vana HCM is a completely integrated HR solution for Small Medium Businesses on the Force.com platform, this means that your business gets everything (CoreHR, Recruiting, Employee Self-Service etc.).

Why Vana HCM meets all your SMB needs:

Integrated HR Solution

We provide a complete hire to retire solution that covers all your HR needs, our solution is not piecemeal your small business will have access to everything including Core HR, Employee self-service, recruiting, payroll connect and more. Every component of Vana HCM is fully accessible and configurable for your business practices and needs.

Social, Mobile and Global

Built for today’s workforce Vana HCM is social, mobile and global ensuring that your workforce is always connected and collaborating. We are built in HTML5 allowing you to access your HR solution using any mobile device.

Total Cost of Ownership

At Vana Workforce we believe that you should not have to choose between features and have to pay more for a specific feature so we built Vana HCM as a complete solution which means that you have access to all the features in the system for only $7/mth/employee. As we improve on Vana HCM you will continue to have access to new features and can choose which ones meet your business requirements and which ones you would like to turn on.

100% Native on the force.com platform

Vana HCM is 100% native to the Force.com platform so our product runs on your existing salesforce instance!
